In BlockJunit4ClassRunner there is a deprecation with no explicit alternati=
ve for runBefores and runAfters (at least I didn't understand the comment, =
so if it is explicit it is not very clear).  Can someone clarify what is go=
ing to happen here?

Some third party libraries extend BlockJUnit4ClassRunn=
er and override these methods.  What are they supposed to do?  It seems qui=
te reasonable to want to modify this behaviour (e.g. to repeat a test metho=
d but only run the befores and afters once, or to add behaviour after the b=
efores but before the test method).
